summary: A dozen rock groups are shown playing in the final five nights of shows leading up the closing of Fillmore West on July 4, 1971.
cast: Bill Graham|Marty Balin|Elvin Bishop|Ed Bogas|Mike Carabello|Jack Casady|John Chambers|John Cipollina|Papa John Creach|John Dawson|Bill Douglass|Spencer Dryden|Gary Duncan|Larry Fields|David Freiberg|Jerry Garcia|Keith Godchaux|Grateful Dead|Michael Holman|Hot Tuna|Robert Hunter|It's a Beautiful Day|Jefferson Airplane|Paul Kantner|Jorma Kaukonen|Bill Kreutzmann|David LaFlamme|Renee LeBallister|Kip Maercklein|Barbara Mauritz|Ron McKernan|Steve Miller|Jim Murray|The New Riders of the Purple Sage|Quicksilver Messenger Service|The Rowan Brothers|Chris Rowan|Lorin Rowan|Santana|Carlos Santana|Patricia Santos|Boz Scaggs|Rick Shlosser|Michael Shrieve|Grace Slick|Bob Swanson|Bob Weir|Mike Bloomfield
keywords: one word title|split screen|san francisco california|musician|music promoter
title: Fillmore
